raw_body: Beloved wife of late Basnayake Nilame Mr. H.M.K. Naranpanawa, loving mother of Saliya and Nirosha, mother-in-law of Ayanthi and Gomi, grandmother of Haritha, Dulanaka, Dinuvi and Vinoth, loving sister of Seetha, Tissa, Sumedha, Sepala, Seevali, late Ramya, Parakrama and Gamini, passed away peacefully on the 23rd of April 2024. Remains lie at Kandy Florists Funeral Parlour. Cremation at the Mahiyyawa crematorium Kandy at 6.00 p.m. on Wednesday, 24
